channel.title: [508] Help [508]
channel.description:
Hi i got a few problems with my [508]
first off, in NPCList, what does this mean?:
// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND
i know it's NPC id, NPC level, NPC hp but after that i'm clueless,
2. How do i add NPC drops?
3. is there a way to get veng working instead of using it over and over again and no effect?
4. Can anybody help me fix dark bow and rune c bow, ATM you just punch them
5. Can I speed up the magic shortbow attack rate? it's too slow
and lastly How to i make NPC's take longer to spawn?
Thanks

item.title: [508] Help [508]
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

[quote=“heroisgay, post:7, topic:250417”]// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND

Id = Npc Id
Lv= Combat lvl
Hp= Hitpoints level
MH= Maxhit
AE= Attack Emote
Be= Block Emote
De= Defence emote
AD= Attack Delay
AT= ??
And NN= The Npc Name , ND = The info as in you clicking examine and the info that comes with it, but this is for your own referance.

Add NPCdrops in your npcdrops.cfg , or an xml file. If you dont have either google it because im lazy.

Veng would be in your playercombat , and playernpccombat (w/e your files are called) and i suggest you google a tut.

Dark bow & R cbow you have to add in a few different files , i dont feal like explaining so google it.

As for speed go to playerweapon.java and search for attackDelay. It should be clear after that.[/quote]

Sound’s like your kinda lazy lol

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help [508]
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

//		ID	LV	HP	MH	AT	WN	SD	AE	BE	DE	AD	NN	ND

Id = Npc Id
Lv= Combat lvl
Hp= Hitpoints level
MH= Maxhit
AE= Attack Emote
Be= Block Emote
De= Defence emote
AD= Attack Delay
AT= ??
And NN= The Npc Name , ND = The info as in you clicking examine and the info that comes with it, but this is for your own referance.

Add NPCdrops in your npcdrops.cfg , or an xml file. If you dont have either google it because im lazy.

Veng would be in your playercombat , and playernpccombat (w/e your files are called) and i suggest you google a tut.

Dark bow & R cbow you have to add in a few different files , i dont feal like explaining so google it.

As for speed go to playerweapon.java and search for attackDelay. It should be clear after that.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help [508]
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

ID = NPC ID - LV = NPC LVL - HP = HP LVL - MH = MAX HIT - AE = ATTACK EMOTE - BE = BLOCK EMOTE - DE = DEFENCE EMOTE - AD = ATTACK DELAY

At = Attack isn’t right man

Read full topic
